metadata.Title: CVE-2021-1048 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: In ep_loop_check_proc of eventpoll.c, there is a possible way to corrupt memory due to a use after free. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.Product: AndroidVersions: Android kernelAndroid ID: A-204573007References: Upstream kernel

criterions.comment: linux-aws: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-azure: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
